about_the_game: New wallpapers will be added, which can be viewed in the GALLERY and set to display on the loading screen.   Included are five wallpapers featuring female officers affiliated to each kingdom, five wallpapers recreating memorable scenes, and 77 wallpapers featuring the character art for each playable character from the "DYNASTY WARRIORS 8 TREASURE BOX" (Japan only release) for a total of 87 wallpapers.
detailed_description: New wallpapers will be added, which can be viewed in the GALLERY and set to display on the loading screen.   Included are five wallpapers featuring female officers affiliated to each kingdom, five wallpapers recreating memorable scenes, and 77 wallpapers featuring the character art for each playable character from the "DYNASTY WARRIORS 8 TREASURE BOX" (Japan only release) for a total of 87 wallpapers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 2.8 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Standard audio device

short_description: 87 new wallpapers will be added, which can be viewed in the GALLERY and set to display on the loading screen. Included are wallpapers featuring female officers affiliated to each kingdom, recreations of memorable scenes, and character art for each playable character in DYNASTY WARRIORS 8.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support
